H0.text: A Nychthemeron is a period of how many consecutive hours. 12

H1.text: A Nychthemeron is a period of how many consecutive hours. 48

H2.text: A Nychthemeron is a period of how many consecutive hours. 18

H3.text: A Nychthemeron is a period of how many consecutive hours. 24

A4.text: Nychthemeron , occasionally nycthemeron or nuchthemeron, is a period of 24 consecutive hours.
